definition[0]: money given by the government in Britain to people who are unemployed
example[0]: Too many young people are still on the dole.
example[1]: The number claiming dole went up by 3,500.
definition[1]: in Britain, money that the government gives to people who are looking for work
example[2]: A whole generation of miners ended up on the dole.
example[3]: unemployed demonstrators protesting at dole cuts
